attributes.additional_details:
In this terrifying and unprecedented time for Ukraine, they need maximum support from the democratic countries around the world. We have seen a lot of actions already to fight back Russia: sanctions, weapons for Ukraine etc. 
The brave Ukrainian people are now fighting Russia for the right to exist as a nation. On the ground they leave no chance to russian troops. BUT! Ukraine are vulnerable in the sky. It's a very crucial for Ukraine to block russian planes, missiles, helicopters. 

Thank you!
attributes.background:
I ask the British government to immediately provide help and close sky for russian over Ukraine.
You should all understand that time is critical for Ukraine and they need your immediate response.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
